<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Seize](/Feats.aspx?ID=3567) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 61</row>

**Archetype** [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182)

**Prerequisites**
[Zombie Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3557)

**Requirements**
Your last action was a successful fist Strike against a creature no more than one size larger than you.

</column>

---

You seize your foe and pull it close. The foe you hit is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) as if you succeeded at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) the foe.
name: Seize
requirement: Your last action was a successful fist Strike against a creature no more than one size larger than you.
